entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers near noon. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 30 km/h. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers near Boston Bar this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
